content: This larger size of the new MacBook Pro models offers all the same advantages as the new MacBook Pro 14-inch (2021).

Hamilton, who is already set to serve a five-place grid penalty for Sunday's race, topped qualifying for the F1 Sprint ahead of championship leader Max Verstappen - but is now the subject of a Brazil investigation.

Maguire, who has come in for some criticism for his Manchester United performances this season, opened the scoring inside 10 minutes, before Harry Kane scored a first-half hat-trick and also set up Jordan Henderson as Albania crumbled at Wembley.
